data.name: Global Azure Day - Milwaukee
data.description:
All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing!
On April 23-25, 2020, all communities will come together once again in the seventh great Global Azure event! Each user group organizes their own one to three day Azure event the way they see fit and how i…
